example.title: Code listing: output from the previous example
example.programlisting:
Current locale: 'en'
strftime test 'Friday, 14 January 2005'
Current locale: 'eng'
strftime test 'Friday, 14 January 2005'
Current locale: 'nl'
strftime test 'vrijdag, 14 januari 2005'
Current locale: 'ptg'
strftime test 'sexta-feira, 14 Janeiro 2005'
Current locale: 'ita'
strftime test 'venerdì, 14 gennaio 2005'
